message: I'm happy to split the money fairly, but I'll take the larger share since I'm making the first offer. Let's get this done quickly!
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the risk of inflation. Let's see if you can do better.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than your last offer. If we keep going back and forth, the money will just keep shrinking.

I'm still not convinced I'm getting a fair share. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the effort I'm putting into this negotiation. Let's see if you can meet me in the middle.
